info.title: semio REST API
info.summary: This is the local rest API of the semio engine.

rotation.title: Rotation
rotation.description: 🔄 The optional horizontal rotation in port direction between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.

tilt.title: Tilt
tilt.description: ↗️ The optional horizontal tilt perpendicular to the port direction (applied after rotation) between the connected and the connecting piece in degrees.

gap.title: Gap
gap.description: ↕️ The optional longitudinal gap (applied after rotation and tilt in port direction) between the connected and the connecting piece.

shift.title: Shift
shift.description: ↔️ The optional lateral shift (applied after rotation and tilt in the plane) between the connected and the connecting piece..

x.title: X
x.description: ➡️ The optional offset in x direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

y.title: Y
y.description: ⬆️ The optional offset in y direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

connected.description: 🧲 The connected side of the connection.

connecting.description: 🧲 The connecting side of the connection.

ConnectionContext.title: ConnectionContext

gap.title: Gap

y.title: Y
y.description: ⬆️ The optional offset in y direction between the icons of the child and the parent piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

connected.description: 🧲 The connected side of the connection.

connecting.description: 🧲 The connecting side of the connection.

ConnectionPrediction.title: ConnectionPrediction
ConnectionPrediction.description: 🖇️ A bidirectional connection between two pieces of a design.

description.title: Description
description.description: 💬 The optional human-readable description of the design.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: 🔀 The optional variant of the design. No variant means the default variant.

view.title: View
view.description: 🥽 The optional view of the design. No view means the default view.

DesignContext.title: DesignContext
DesignContext.description: 🏙️ A design is a collection of pieces that are connected.

description.title: Description
description.description: 💬 The optional human-readable description of the design.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: 🪙 The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.

image.title: Image
image.description: 🖼️ The optional url to the image of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: 🔀 The optional variant of the design. No variant means the default variant.

view.title: View
view.description: 🥽 The optional view of the design. No view means the default view.

DesignInput.title: DesignInput
DesignInput.description: 🏙️ A design is a collection of pieces that are connected.

description.title: Description

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: 🪙 The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.

image.title: Image
image.description: 🖼️ The optional url to the image of the design. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: 🔀 The optional variant of the design. No variant means the default variant.

view.title: View
view.description: 🥽 The optional view of the design. No view means the default view.

createdAt.title: Createdat
createdAt.description: 🕒 The creation date of the design.

lastUpdateAt.title: Lastupdateat
lastUpdateAt.description: 🕒 The last update date of the design.

Design.title: Design
Design.description: 🏙️ A design is a collection of pieces that are connected.

description.title: Description
description.description: 💬 The optional human-readable description of the design.

DesignPrediction.title: DesignPrediction
DesignPrediction.description: 🏙️ A design is a collection of pieces that are connected.

x.title: X
x.description: 🏁 The x-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

y.title: Y
y.description: 🏁 The y-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

DiagramPointInput.title: DiagramPointInput
DiagramPointInput.description: 📺 A 2d-point (xy) of integers in screen coordinate system.

x.title: X
x.description: 🏁 The x-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

y.title: Y
y.description: 🏁 The y-coordinate of the icon of the piece in the diagram. One unit is equal the width of a piece icon.

DiagramPoint.title: DiagramPoint
DiagramPoint.description: 📺 A 2d-point (xy) of integers in screen coordinate system.

description.title: Description
description.description: 💬 The optional human-readable description of the kit.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: 🪙 The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the kit. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB. kit.

image.title: Image
image.description: 🖼️ The optional url to the image of the kit. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.

preview.title: Preview
preview.description: 🔮 The optional url of the preview image of the kit. The url must point to a landscape image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a 2x1 rectangle. The image must be at least 1920x960 pixels and smaller than 15 MB.

version.title: Version
version.description: 🔀 The optional version of the kit. No version means the latest version.

remote.title: Remote
remote.description: ☁️ The optional Unique Resource Locator (URL) where to fetch the kit remotely.

homepage.title: Homepage
homepage.description: 🏠 The optional url of the homepage of the kit.

license.title: License
license.description: ⚖️ The optional license [ spdx id | url ] of the kit.

subgroup.title: Subgroup
subgroup.description: 📌 The optional sub-group of the locator. No sub-group means true.

LocatorContext.title: LocatorContext
LocatorContext.description: 🗺️ A locator is meta-data for grouping ports.

subgroup.title: Subgroup
subgroup.description: 📌 The optional sub-group of the locator. No sub-group means true.

LocatorInput.description: 🗺️ A locator is meta-data for grouping ports.

Locator.title: Locator
Locator.description: 🗺️ A locator is meta-data for grouping ports.

plane.description: ◳ The optional plane of the piece. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a plane.

PieceContext.title: PieceContext
PieceContext.description: ⭕ A piece is a 3d-instance of a type in a design.

PieceId.title: PieceId
PieceId.description: 🪪 The props to identify the piece within the parent design.

plane.description: ◳ The optional plane of the piece. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a plane.

center.description: 📺 The optional center of the piece in the diagram. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a center.

PieceInput.title: PieceInput
PieceInput.description: ⭕ A piece is a 3d-instance of a type in a design.

plane.description: ◳ The optional plane of the piece. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a plane.

center.description: 📺 The optional center of the piece in the diagram. When pieces are connected only one piece can have a center.

Piece.title: Piece
Piece.description: ⭕ A piece is a 3d-instance of a type in a design.

PiecePrediction.title: PiecePrediction
PiecePrediction.description: ⭕ A piece is a 3d-instance of a type in a design.

PlaneContext.title: PlaneContext
PlaneContext.description: ◳ A plane is an origin (point) and an orientation (x-axis and y-axis).

PlaneInput.title: PlaneInput
PlaneInput.description: ◳ A plane is an origin (point) and an orientation (x-axis and y-axis).

Plane.title: Plane
Plane.description: ◳ A plane is an origin (point) and an orientation (x-axis and y-axis).

description.title: Description
description.description: 💬 The optional human-readable description of the port.

PortContext.title: PortContext
PortContext.description: 🔌 A port is a connection point (with a direction) of a type.

PortId.title: PortId
PortId.description: 🪪 The props to identify the port within the parent type.

description.title: Description
description.description: 💬 The optional human-readable description of the port.

point.description: ✖️ The connection point of the port that is attracted to another connection point.

direction.description: ➡️ The direction of the port. When another piece connects the direction of the other port is flipped and then the pieces are aligned.

PortInput.title: PortInput
PortInput.description: 🔌 A port is a connection point (with a direction) of a type.

description.title: Description
description.description: 💬 The optional human-readable description of the port.

point.description: ✖️ The connection point of the port that is attracted to another connection point.

direction.description: ➡️ The direction of the port. When another piece connects the direction of the other port is flipped and then the pieces are aligned.

Port.title: Port
Port.description: 🔌 A port is a connection point (with a direction) of a type.

value.title: Value
value.description: 📏 The optional value [ text | url ] of the quality. No value is equivalent to true for the name.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: 📏 The optional unit of the value of the quality.

unit.title: Unit

definition.title: Definition
definition.description: 📏 The optional definition [ text | uri ] of the quality.

mime.title: Mime
mime.description: ✉️ The Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (MIME) type of the content of the resource of the representation.

lod.title: Lod
lod.description: 🔍 The optional Level of Detail/Development/Design (LoD) of the representation. No lod means the default lod.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: 🏷️ The optional tags to group representations. No tags means default.

url.title: Url
url.description: 🔗 The Unique Resource Locator (URL) to the resource of the representation.

RepresentationInput.title: RepresentationInput
RepresentationInput.description: 💾 A representation is a link to a resource that describes a type for a certain level of detail and tags.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Ⓜ️ The length unit of the point and the direction of the ports of the type.

TypeContext.title: TypeContext
TypeContext.description: 🧩 A type is a reusable element that can be connected with other types over ports.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: 🔀 The optional variant of the type. No variant means the default variant.

TypeId.title: TypeId
TypeId.description: 🪪 The props to identify the type.

description.title: Description
description.description: 💬 The optional human-readable description of the type.

icon.title: Icon
icon.description: 🪙 The optional icon [ emoji | logogram | url ] of the type. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 256x256 pixels and smaller than 1 MB.

image.title: Image
image.description: 🖼️ The optional url to the image of the type. The url must point to a quadratic image [ png | jpg | svg ] which will be cropped by a circle. The image must be at least 720x720 pixels and smaller than 5 MB.

variant.title: Variant
variant.description: 🔀 The optional variant of the type. No variant means the default variant.

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Ⓜ️ The length unit of the point and the direction of the ports of the type.
